divs: Sighting Detailsi was online talkin with my friend when my mom called and said she would be home soon. as i was on the phone i was walking around the living room and looked out the window and noticed a large thin black cigar with a light gray stripe down the middle length-wise shaped object hovering in the sky it didn't move at all and i heard no noise. i couldn't tell what the object was at first so i looked hard and still couldn't guess what the object was but it didn't look like any aircraft i had ever seen. It had to be a few miles away but i would guess it was a few hundred feet long. when i noticed i told my mom and friend but about 23 seconds after i noticed the object it just faded away.After that i didn't see anything else wierd.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Hopkinton
There were no other sightings in Hopkinton on or around May 14th 2009
